name: Normal Clicker Game
description:
Want some clickness fun well come to a normal clicker game! It's normal it's free!

The best part of it is it's made from scratch!

Sorry, but it does not save. Save by going to scratch, set the number of helpers and clicks, and save in scratch!

We have another file that will save like this: Save in Scratch to keep your stuff

In the future we might get a demo!
